c(thEstart[1:3],THESTART[4])

quanDs <- quantile(norm.sum.crit.ds, probs = c(0.02,0.05,0.10,0.25,0.5,0.75,0.9,0.95,1))
> quanDs
      2%       5%      10%      25%      50%      75%      90%      95%     100% 
2.393416 2.835212 3.403912 4.089479 4.188164 4.253863 4.325147 4.332915 4.338741 
> earlyiterdsup <- numeric(length(quanDs))
> for(i in 1:length(quanDs)){
+   earlyiterdsup[i] <- which(norm.sum.crit.ds >= quanDs[i])[1]
+ }
> earlyiterdsup
